name: Honey Char Siu
effect:
Restores 8–10% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 210–300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. As the name implies, the marinated meat skewered with a special metal fork is hung above the stove and roasted. The taste of freshly roasted Char Siu is a favorite of many a gourmand.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 210 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. Overly sweet seasoning makes for cloying torment of the tongue. As the local saying goes, a minute error can make a huge difference, and it seems that this holds true with cooking.

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 260 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. As the name implies, the marinated meat skewered with a special metal fork is hung above the stove and roasted. The taste of freshly roasted Char Siu is a favorite of many a gourmand.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A type of roasted meat from Liyue. Richly red in color, aromatic, and intensely flavorful. Why, one might even faint from gluttony if one stares at it for too long. Between mouthfuls of delicious meat and rich sauce, one bowl of rice might seem too measly a match for this taste experience!
